name: Variable Term Agreement
title: VTA
definition: Identifies the duration, identifying USOC, contract date or contract identification number of any variable term agreement that may be offered by a provider.
usageNotes: Optional when the first position of the REQTYP field on the ASR Form is "V" or "X" and the VCVTA field on the VC Form is not populated, otherwise prohibited.
fieldNotes: Implemented June 13, 1998  97. VCVTA -  Virtual Connection Variable Term Agreement Identifies the duration, identifying USOC, contract date or contract identification number of any variable term agreement that may be offered by a provider for a virtual connection.
